column4: Anyone knows a good way to recover data on an ext2 partition that was accidentaly used under in Vmware for another OS ? (not sure if something was written on it, but the parition type is unkown now)
no, I recovered some files with PhotoRec 6.8... but there are some block in the middle of the movie, and it is not even the good format
foremost only recovers what it can recover fully.
but maybe it can be corrupted no ?
the file, as data (a little bit) was written on the disk after
i'm sorry, but i do not understand..you mean the file can be corrupted..yes it can..but foremost is your  best bet on linux
the better recovery progs are on windows though
I am reading the manual, but I don't see where I can specify the device to check
ok... lauching it, i will see, thanks, can easy recovery under windows recover ext2 files ?
